title: Maximum 20% of total proposed Built-up area (excluding parking area) inclusive of such additional F
clause_text: Maximum 20% of total proposed Built-up area (excluding parking area) inclusive of such additional F.S.I. may be permitted for support services as defined in IT/ITES Policy 2015, in IT Parks and remaining built-up area shall be utilized for IT/ITES.
